item.title: Logout GET or POST
item.description: [Copy]Logout: GET or POST This question is not about when to use GET or POST in general; it is about which is the recommended one for handling logging out of a web application. I have found plenty of information on the differences between GET and POST in the general sense, but I did not find a definite answer for this particular scenario. As a pragmatist, I'm inclined to use GET,
